description:
One of the top technology campus in Medan, Indonesia.

- Part of Mikroskil Programming Club (2020-2021)
- Became a Class Commissioner (2023)

Part of Studi Independen - Kampus Merdeka program by Ministry of Education. Learnt about data analytics and software engineering.

- Leader of Team C and Group 6 Balikpapan Section.
- Leading Group 6 to achieve the best group of Data Analytics' Capstone Project Shoping Cart Category
- Achieved final score 98 out of 100

High school at SMA Sisingamangaraja, Tanjungbalai with science major.

- Bronze winner in the 100m athletics event in Pekan Olahraga Kota Tanjungbalai (2017)
- Became part of school representative in Physics Olympic
- Became part of school representative in 3x3 Honda Developmental Basketball League (DBL) (2019)
